DOC.brief_summary: Checking gastric residual prior continuation/increase enteral feed prolongs time establish full gastric feed early postnatal period .
DOC.criteria: Infants birth weight ≥ 1500g < 2000g Age ≤48 hour life Informed , write parental consent Antenatally recognize gastrointestinal malformation Major congenital anomaly Chromosomal anomaly NEC stage II Severe acidosis , asphyxia ( pH < 7.0 ) Severe growth restriction 3rd percentile
